whole_letter:
Dr. Emily Johnson
XYZ Medical Clinic
123 Main St, Suite 101
City, State, 12345
October 2, 2024

Dr. Michael Lee
Cardiology Associates
456 Oak Ave, Suite 202
City, State, 67890

Dear Dr. Lee,

I am referring Mr. John Smith, a 55-year-old male, for urgent evaluation due to suspected coronary artery disease. Mr. Smith has been experiencing chest pain, shortness of breath, and palpitations over the past few weeks.

**Referral Reason:**
Based on the patient's symptoms and initial examination findings, there is a high suspicion of coronary artery disease. An ECG showed ST-segment abnormalities, and his blood pressure was elevated. Given his history of hypertension and family history of heart disease, further cardiological assessment is necessary.

Your expertise is needed to confirm the diagnosis and develop an appropriate treatment plan to manage his condition.

Best regards,
Dr. Emily Johnson
XYZ Medical Clinic
referral_content: Based on the patient's symptoms and initial examination findings, there is a high suspicion of coronary artery disease. An ECG showed ST-segment abnormalities, and his blood pressure was elevated. Given his history of hypertension and family history of heart disease, further cardiological assessment is necessary.
